email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. We are exploring options for shipping 120,000MT of iron ore from Santos to Rotterdam under FOB terms. We've been advised that your vessel, the MV OCEAN HORIZON, might be available. Could you confirm her current position and expected availability? Also, can you provide the initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Maria Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for reaching out. Yes, the MV OCEAN HORIZON is currently open in Singapore and could be positioned to Santos for your laycan, ideally starting from November 20. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 18.50 per metric tonne. Kindly note that this rate includes fuel but not any potential demurrage charges, should they arise.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!
Cheers,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Thank you for the immediate response and details. The rate of USD 18.50 seems a bit high considering current market fluctuations. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Maria Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the current market conditions, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 17.80 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, and the expected loading window in Santos is from November 20 to November 25.

Please let me know if this works for you.
Cheers,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

The revised rate of USD 17.80 and the loading window from November 20 to November 25 are acceptable. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 120,000MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as November 20 to November 25. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Cheers,
James Wilson
